column1: Table 1a. Selected characteristics of artists and the total labor force: 2015-2019
Percent with a bachelor's degree or higher level of training3
Median earnings of workers employed full-year/full time4
* Not estimated due to small sample sizes
2 Full-year/full-time is defined as working at least 50 weeks out of the year for 35 hours or more.

4 The earnings estimates reported are adjusted to constant dollars and are restricted to respondents with $1 or more in total person's earnings. The estimates were rounded to the nearest multiple of 5.
Earnings ratios based on unrounded earnings data.
Data source: American Community Survey (ACS), PUMS, U.S. Census Bureau
